CHAT.comment: The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEVE SIX ON BEHALF OF THE PLAINTIFF
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN W. SUTHERS ON BEHALF OF THE DEFENDANT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF STEVE SIX ON BEHALF OF THE PLAINTIFF
(Whereupon, at 10:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
